name: elvd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), universe)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wcel(cv(s0), universe)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), universe)), w1)

|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), universe)), w1)

comment: If a proposition is implied by ` x e. _V ` (which is true, see ~ vex ) and another antecedent, then it is implied by that other antecedent. Deduction associated with ~ elv . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 23-Oct-2018.)
